main.name: Shelby Anne Rothman
main.bio: I come from a background of Cultural Theory and design. I am curious, open-minded, empathetic, and dedicated to continuous learning. I am Effectual at integrating creativity, problem solving, and attention to detail to develop clean code and user-friendly applications. I am sharply intelligent, flexible, and a team-player with great communication skills. My interests outside of computer programming and web development are art, yoga, dogs, music, skateboarding, and graphic novels.
main.contactmessage: Please contact me for more information

education.description: A 12-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS.

work.title: Assistant Manager
work.description: Implemented office/studio procedures, supervised projects, preparing reports, payroll, handling phone calls and correspondence, maintaining a good relationship with customers, and organizing the overall flow of the, students, teachers, studio and office.

projects.title: GeoQuiz
projects.category: A full-stack MERN application that allows users to test their geography skills.

projects.title: Marvel Match
projects.category: Quiz to find your perfect match from the Marvel characters

projects.title: Handlebar Rolls
projects.category: A sushi logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM following the MVC design pattern with Node and MySQL.

projects.title: MySQL Employee Tracker
projects.category: A Command Line Interface Application used as a solution for managing a company's employees using node, inquirer, and MySQL.

projects.title: Express Notes
projects.category: An application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes. This application will use an express backend and save and retrieve note data from a JSON file.

projects.title: The Binge Guide
projects.category: A full-stack web application for a user to sign in and search for shows and save information on how & where to watch them

projects.title: Team Generator
projects.category: A software engineering team generator command line application.

projects.title: Budget Optimizer
projects.category: A Budget Tracker application that allows for offline access and functionality.

projects.title: Exertion Tracker
projects.category: A workout tracker that uses Mongo database with a Mongoose schema and handle routes with Express.
